data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The other modules in the Tree namespace that implement n-ary trees
    are either quite large (Tree::DAG_Node) or not very OO (Tree::Nary).
    My module, Tree::Simple is a simple generic OO tree. There are other
    tree modules too, outside of the Tree::* namespace, but they are
    usually specifc to their particular usage. I actually go into more
    detail in the module documentation as to how this compares to other
    tree implementations (only in version 0.14 which I just uploaded, it
    should be there before too long).
